text: Ndughu tsangu, lelo tulonge choni? Hamtingana hamwe kumtamanila Imulungu, yumwe yembe wila, yungi yalangulitse, na yungi yawe na ughubulo iulawa kwe Imulungu, ayu yalonge kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, yungi yawafasilile iwanu achila ichilongighwe. Ghose ghatendeke kwa kuwapfila iwanu we Imulungu.
